text: The most common thermal process is pasteurization (thermal inactivation of microorganisms at temperatures below 100 1C). Other processes are sterilization (115-120 1C, 20-45 min), UHT treatment (165-140 1C, few seconds), radiation with UV, high-pressure process (40-60 1C, 2000-6000 bar) and microwave treatment.

Trial registration Clinicaltrials.gov NCT00299546 . Registered 03 March 2006.
